name: Bolivian Peanut Soup (Sopa de Mani)
author: peanut soup
summary: Peanut-based soup topped with fries and parsley.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, divided, or as needed
1  tomato, skin removed and flesh chopped
1 pinch red chile powder, or to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
directions: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large pot over medium heat; cook and stir onion, tomato, and carrot until tender, about 10 minutes
Grind peanuts in a blender or food processor until the consistency of peanut butter, avoiding big chunks
Mix peanut butter, beef broth, and peas into onion mixture; bring soup to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet; cook and stir potato until crispy and browned, 5 to 10 minutes
Ladle soup into bowls and top with crispy potato and parsley
